name: GMAIL__SEND_EMAIL
description: Sends an email on behalf of the user

sender.description: The user's email address where the email will be sent from. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

recipient.description: The email address of the recipient.

body.description: The body content of the email, for now only plain text is supported.

cc.description: The email addresses of the cc recipients.

bcc.description: The email addresses of the bcc recipients.

name: GMAIL__MESSAGES_LIST
description: Lists the messages in the user's mailbox

maxResults.description: Maximum number of messages to return. Default is 100.

pageToken.description: Page token to retrieve a specific page of results

q.description: Only return messages matching the specified query. Supports the same query format as the Gmail search box.

labelIds.description: Only return messages with labels that match all of the specified label IDs.

includeSpamTrash.description: Include messages from SPAM and TRASH in the results.
